backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user profiles, access control, blob storage, and extensive U.S. geography data types and structures. Also initializes empty geography data and includes authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs. Provides metadata for routing, profile UI, and profile editing features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of key frontend files across the project. Used as reference for build planning and architecture understanding.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document describing Whisper’s system vision, hierarchical installations, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design. Establishes principles for scaling, routing, and future multi-canister topology.
frontend/docs/COMPLAINT_CATEGORY_SUGGEST: Specification defining backend storage and schema for complaint categories used by the AI Secretary. Describes stable-memory storage and jurisdiction-based category organization.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites, dfx configuration, and steps for deploying Whisper to ICP. Provides upgrade guidance, cycle management, and best practices.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes detailing homepage redesign updates including hero image, overlay, contrast fixes, typography, and UI improvements. Documents visual changes and accessibility enhancements across the homepage.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines Whisper’s phased development plan with goals, deliverables, and non-goals for each stage.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Explains how features register navigation targets for the Secretary assistant using a registry hook.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Provides a full manual smoke test for proposal creation, issue workflows, and regression checks.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_REGRESSION_PATC: Defines a QA checklist for validating regression fixes across logo rendering, hover styles, profile loading, and navigation.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Describes Whisper’s visual design system including colors, typography, and accessibility guidelines.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the app root and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: SVG logo asset featuring a teal circular emblem with stylized white elements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing navigation, Secretary integration, lazy-loaded pages, and react-query setup.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Header component with logo, navigation, mobile menu, login handling, and admin/user menu integration.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Reusable circular icon wrapper supporting size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Spinner with optional label providing consistent loading UI.
frontend/src/components/common/LoginButt: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth state with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/common/UserProfi: User dropdown menu showing avatar, profile navigation, and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form card for creating a new instance with name generation, geography selection, validation, and proposal submission.
County dropdown that loads counties for a selected state with error and loading handling.
Place dropdown that loads cities/towns for a selected county with error and loading handling.
State dropdown that fetches and displays all states with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing issue project details with tabs for overview and tasks, using proposal data and category lookup.
Tasks tab allowing creation, listing, and status toggling of tasks tied to a proposal via task-related hooks.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog for displaying proposal details, loading live data, and optionally opening the related Issue Project dialog.
Section listing all proposals with loading/error states, refresh controls, and dialog navigation via secretary events.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: UI card prompting users to open the secretary feature, with dismiss and open actions.
Typeahead input for filtering and selecting location options with keyboard navigation and loading states.
Implements an interactive secretary chat widget handling discovery and issue-reporting flows with stateful UI, navigation, and backend-driven suggestions.
Renders the SecretaryWidget into a dedicated overlay root using React portals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
Fetches and saves the authenticated user's profile with identity-scoped caching and mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplaintSuggestio: Fetches complaint suggestions or categories from the backend based on geographic hierarchy and search terms.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Checks instance-name availability and submits new instance proposals with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPath.ts: Tracks the current SPA route path by listening to popstate events for navigation changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value to delay reactions such as API calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProposal.ts: Deletes a proposal via the backend and invalidates related moderation and proposal queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHideProposal.ts: Hides a proposal through the backend and refreshes moderation and proposal data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading, and state exposure via a React context provider.
React-query hooks to fetch, create, and update tasks for a proposal with optimistic cache updates.
Custom hook that syncs React state with localStorage while handling SSR safely.
frontend/src/hooks/useModerationItems.ts: Fetches admin moderation queue proposals and maps them into UI-friendly moderation items.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Preloads an image URL and exposes ready/error state with automatic resets on source change.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of backend query hooks for parent checks, proposals, single proposal fetch, and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages chat message state and menu visibility for a secretary-style chat UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Registry for navigation destinations with keyword lookup and programmatic navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetIssueProjectCat: Stores and retrieves issue project categories via localStorage as a temporary backend workaround.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook to update proposal status and invalidate related queries for UI refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React-query hooks to fetch U.S. states, counties, and places with graceful handling of empty results.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, and utility classes such as hero layout, hover effects, and overlay helpers.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Provides helpers for labeling geography levels, formatting population, extracting geography parts, and generating readable geography strings for proposals.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines metadata-driven navigation options for the Secretary assistant and utilities for keyword matching and deep-link creation/parsing.
frontend/src/lib/uiCopy.ts: Centralized UI text strings covering product info, navigation, proposals, auth, instance creation, and other interface copy.
frontend/src/lib/whisperInstanceNaming.t: Generates, validates, normalizes, and parses WHISPER-prefixed instance names based on geography level.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and mounts it to the root element.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminModeration: Admin interface for reviewing and moderating proposals, handling approval, rejection, hiding, and deletion with permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Mode: Displays a table of moderation items with status badges, category icons, and actions including approve, reject, hide, and delete. Manages confirmation dialogs and handles empty states.
frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Renders a placeholder geography page with header navigation and a card indicating upcoming geography features.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileEditPa: Provides a profile editing form with name, bio, links, and image upload/preview, syncing data with backend and local storage. Handles validation, saving, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/profile/profileLocalS: Manages local-only profile fields using localStorage, providing helpers to load, save, and clear partial profile state. Supplies default values for unsupported backend fields.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileViewPa: Renders a user's profile with image, bio, and local profile fields, handling authentication, loading states, and navigation to edit mode. Converts image bytes to blob URLs for display.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the profile page.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Resolves asset URLs using the app’s base path, normalizing slashes for deployment under non-root paths. Ensures public assets load correctly in all environments.
frontend/src/utils/secretaryProjectNavig: Implements custom event-based navigation for secretary-to-project flows, providing helpers to dispatch and listen for navigation events. Returns cleanup functions for listeners.
frontend/src/utils/spaNavigate.ts: Implements SPA navigation using history.pushState and popstate events, respecting the app’s base URL. Updates the route without a full page reload.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters from query strings or hashes, including session-backed persistence. Includes helpers for clearing parameters safely.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into friendly user-facing messages while logging original errors. Maps common error patterns to specific messages for better UX.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, fonts, animations, and plugins for animate and typography.
project_state.json: Stores the project's current state including profile UI requirements, architectural notes, and pending feature requests for view and edit flows.
